trans-unit.source: Represents a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 表示探索 (Discovery) 文件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services, given an URL.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務探索牽涉到探索可用的 XML Web 服務 url。

trans-unit.source: The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.
trans-unit.target: URL 通常是指向探索文件，通常會有 a.disco 檔案的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The discovery document, which is an XML document, contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as a service description, XML Schema Definition (XSD) language schema, or another discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件，這是 XML 文件，包含參考的 XML Web 服務，例如服務描述、 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 語言結構描述或另一個探索文件的檔案存在相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the discovery document; where the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of the references contained within the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表探索文件; 的內容其中<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A>屬性包含一份探索文件中包含的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example reads a discovery document from a file using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Read%2A> and writes it back out to file using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例讀取探索文件檔案，使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Read%2A>和寫入，並傳回檔案使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Write%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> that is tested whether it can be deserialized into a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，要測試是否能還原序列化為 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the passed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> can be deserialized into a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 是否可還原序列化為 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> can be deserialized into a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 可還原序列化為 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example reads in the contents of a discovery document, if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.CanRead%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會讀取內容中的探索文件，如果<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.CanRead%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Namespace of the discovery XML element of a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件的探索 XML 項目的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A discovery document contains references to documents describing Web Services.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件包含描述 Web 服務的文件的參考。

trans-unit.source: These references are XML elements contained within a discovery XML element.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考會探索 XML 項目中包含的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: That discovery XML element is a member of the XML namespace specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Namespace> constant.
trans-unit.target: 該探索 XML 項目是所指定的 XML 命名空間成員<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Namespace>常數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the XML namespace associated with the discovery XML element of a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示與探索文件的探索 XML 項目相關聯的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> from the passed object.
trans-unit.target: 從傳遞的物件讀取並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> from which to read the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 從傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 讀取並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />，包含來自傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 的探索文件內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> from which to read the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> from the passed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 從傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 讀取並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />，包含來自傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的探索文件內容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example reads in the contents of a discovery document, if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.CanRead%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會讀取內容中的探索文件，如果<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.CanRead%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 從傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 讀取並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />，包含來自傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 的探索文件內容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example reads the discovery document from " `http://localhost/example_Write2_cs.vsdisco` " into a <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會讀取來自的探索文件 」 `http://localhost/example_Write2_cs.vsdisco` 」 到<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>。

trans-unit.source: A list of references contained within the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 內含於探索文件的參考清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing the references within the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，包含探索文件中的參考。

trans-unit.source: A discovery document contains references to information about the existence of XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件包含參考的 XML Web 服務存在相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: These references can refer to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述、 XSD 結構描述或其他探索文件可以參考這些參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of these references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A>屬性包含這些參考的清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates over the references for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉探索文件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Writes this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed object.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 寫入至傳遞的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> into which this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> is written.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 所要寫入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 寫入至傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes a discovery document out to a file named `log.txt` using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將探索文件寫出至名為`log.txt`使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Write%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Writes this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 寫入至傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes a discovery document into a <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會寫入到探索文件<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>。

trans-unit.source: Writes this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 寫入至傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes a discovery document into a <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會寫入到探索文件<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>。
